welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Akono, Cameroon! Known for its vibrant culture and stunning natural beauty, we invite you to experience the charm of our city and make unforgettable memories exploring all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay and soak in the rich culture and warm hospitality of our community."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Nsimalen International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Nsimalen International Airport handles the transportation of goods and freight.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to handling cargo flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
